vclaim: Dr. Robert Gallo, the man who helped discover HIV, admitted that he was "forced" to "create HIV as a secret weapon to eliminate African ethnicity."
date: stated on February 14, 2019 in a Facebook post:
title: No, the world that discovered HIV didn't say it was made as a secret weapon.
text: In 1984, Dr. Robert Gallo gained global fame when he jointly discovered that HIV was the cause of AIDS and then developed a blood test for HIV. Now, an article on Facebook says that Gallo confessed that "he was forced to manufacture HIV as a secret weapon to eliminate African race." But Gallo never said that or anything close to it. This quote is completely false. The article was referred to as part of Facebook efforts to combat false news and misleading information in its news broadcast. ∙ (Read more about our partnership with Facebook.) A repeat of the false allegation - that Gallo "invented HIV to evacuate the world" - has been around the Internet since at least 2016, when it was published on several websites and blogs known for publishing conspiracy theories and artificial stories. On January 12, 2021, he wrote in an Instagram article saying that Joe Biden remained silent about the violence in Black Lives-Mite protests. Prepared by Tom Kircher: January 16, 2021 in 2017, the AIDS Research Programme Centre for Southern Africa (Cabresa) issued a statement about the allegation that it "intentionally undermines the fight against AIDS." The statement said: "He wants to be real, a picture of a newspaper bearing the image of a prominent scientist Robert Gallo in his lab who claims to have created HIV, the virus that causes AIDS, as a "secret weapon to eliminate the African race." "And while the story, no doubt, is just bullshit and lies, it plays on the fantasy of those who insist on believing conspiracy theories around the West in an attempt to destroy Africa." Gallo is currently Director of the Institute of Human Ecology at the University of Maryland School of Medicine in Baltimore. The claim that Gallo said anything about HIV is a secret weapon is "pants on fire."
